Recollections of Balfe
Queens Park, Chesterfield, Derbyshire Promoted by Chesterfield Borough Police Athletic Club. Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £5, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest - 1st Butterley, 2nd Eckington. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 23, 2013, 10:46 a.m. Jan. 25, 2019, 9:49 a.m.
1 Clay Cross H. Furniss
2 Clipstone Colliery Welfare Jack Boddice
3 Dove Holes Band J. A. Greenwood
